expected_behavior: Agent recognizes argument 'HEAD~3..HEAD' as a git range
Agent uses git diff HEAD~3..HEAD to identify changed files
Agent runs Wave 0 triage on files changed in the range
Agent scales review strategy based on changed file count
Agent applies at least 2 creative review lenses per scope
Agent spawns research subagents (Wave 2) to validate findings
Agent presents findings with confidence scores and citations
